deprecated_legacy_configuration.title: Deprecated Secondary/Legacy configuration method
deprecated_legacy_configuration.description: Secondary/Legacy configuration method is now deprecated and will be removed in a future release. Please migrate to the Primary configuration method. Click 'Learn More' for details on configuration. A potential configuration has been placed in the o365_storage folder.

error.invalid_url: Error, the originating url does not seem to be a valid microsoft redirect
error.minimum_permissions: Minimum permissions not granted for account: {account_name}
error.missing_token_file: Token file is missing after successful authentication, check log for file system errors
error.token_file_error: Token file retrieval error, check log for errors from O365

request_default.title: Authorization Required - {account_name}
request_default.description:
Complete the configuration by clicking on the link and copying the returned url into this field afterwards and submit

[Link O365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}

request_alt.title: Authorization Required - {account_name}
request_alt.description:
To link your O365 account, click the link, login, and authorize:

[Link O365 account]({auth_url}){failed_permissions}
